image_gallery:
[{"url":"/generated-images/build-24-1762615443744.png","prompt":"Here's an optimized image generation prompt:

"Modern l-shaped gaming battlestation in dark oak veneer, photographed from a 3/4 angle in a moody home office setting with ambient RGB backlighting. Dramatic evening lighting emphasizes the clean lines and professional cable management, with subtle accent lighting illuminating the workspace and peripherals."

This prompt combines key elements:
- Professional photography style (3/4 angle, moody lighting)
- Material specifics (dark oak veneer, black pedestals)
- Lighting ambiance (RGB, evening, accent lighting)
- Organization elements (cable management, monitor arms)
- Gaming aesthetic while maintaining professional appeal","created_at":"2025-11-08T15:24:03.759Z","is_primary":true}]
